#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cmath>
#define  s(n) scanf("%d",&n)
using namespace std;

int mod(int a)
{
    if(a<0)
    return -a;
    else
    return a;
}
int main()
{
    int t;
    s(t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int e,o,temp;
        s(e);
        s(o);
        if((e+o)%5!=0)
        printf("-1\n");
        else{
        int avg=(e+o)/5;
        temp=2*avg-e;
        int diff=mod(temp);
        temp=3*avg-o;
        if(diff== mod(temp))
        {
            printf("%d\n",diff);
        }
        else
        printf("-1\n");}
    }
return 0;
}
